Congressional Reports: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

The Committee on Ways and Means, to whom was referred the bill (H.R. 4039) to make technical and clarifying amendments to recently enacted provisions relating to titles II and XVI of the Social Security Act and to provide for a temporary extension of demonstration project authority in the Social Security Administration, having considered the same, report favorably thereon without amendment and recommend that the bill do pass.
